user.title: OVO Charge Account
user.description: Enter your OVO Charge (Bonnet) email address. This will trigger a 'magic link' to be sent to your inbox for authentication.

link.title: Verify Magic Link
link.description: A magic link has been sent to {email}. Please check your inbox, copy the entire link, and paste it below to complete the setup.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the OVO Charge API. Please check your network and try again.
error.invalid_auth: The magic link is invalid, expired, or does not match the email address. Please restart the setup to get a new link.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This OVO Charge account is already configured.
